website_summaries.verdict: Though it only supports analog stereo audio, the Logitech F540's multisystem support and impressive sound quality make it ideal for gaming and any other source you can throw at it.
pros: Wirelessly transmits up to three sources
RCA and headphone jack interfaces supported
internal rechargeable battery, adjustable boom mic with LED
onboard volume, input, and mute controls
cons: Analog workarounds for Xbox 360 aren't foolproof

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers making calls from the computer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to make calls from my home computer easier to hear and understand while home during this COVID-19 quarantine crisis. I hate using my school laptop for long period of time because the screen is so small. The sound is very nice and there are no wires! The charge lasts for days. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: has one weakness
customer_reviews.text: i work in a noisy environment and i need a headset to use with my phone (for both calls and music) that allows me to hear. the ambient noise actually requires i wear ear plugs and turn up the volumn. however with these, turning up the volumn produces noticeable and annoying distortion, plus high bass in the sound produces a headache inducing hum. prior to these i used a cabled headsetthat had no problem, they got broke is why i bought these, and thot wireless would be cool. maybe they are defective but i'm not screwing with it, i'll forego the wireless and just replace the broken ones that worked.
customer_reviews.author: jwolfley

customer_reviews.title: Mic Sensitivity is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: As you've probably seen elsewhere, this is overall a great headset but has absolutely absurd microphone sensitivity. I can be twenty feet away from my brother who's playing call of duty and the microphone will pick up more or less everything. Other than the microphone this is a great headset - the wireless feature is outstanding. I can go up to my second floor from my basement and still get clear sound which blows my mind. Overall, I recommend this headset when it's on sale (I got it for $93)
customer_reviews.author: Paymahn Moghadasian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Multiple sources and Playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for a lot of money about 2-3 years ago, the charger failed and I thought it was the headphones, I then bought these and ordered a charger, now I have 2. They are both great. If you want to hear game audio and chat for a Playstation 3, these work perfectly. The sound is better than the TV but probably not as good as surround sound. I also use these for my TV when I want to watch and somebody else is reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jparsons

customer_reviews.title: Good for Xbox 360, only one issue
customer_reviews.text: The headset works well, although I'd say it's meant for smaller heads (it's a bit tight on me, but it seems to get looser with use). The issue is with the lack of mic feedback when using xbox chat. Without the xbox cable plugged in, you can hear yourself talk, which makes things sound less muffled (so you don't yell while talking to friends). The second you plug the cable in, however, that feature is disabled :(
customer_reviews.author: Matt 12334

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great if you play your ps3 and like to talk with friends it is easy to mute and un mute the mic when ever you want and has individual controls for the chat sound level and the game sound level. charge time is good, it needs charged about as offten as the controllers so its perfect. the only down side i have found is that i would have liked it to be a little bit louder. i like to blast myself out sometimes and this one never hits that point of being to loud to handle
customer_reviews.author: Will P.

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless headset for gaming/movies
customer_reviews.text: This particular headset was an excellent choice for me. My previous headset was nothing but a constricting mess of cable and wiring and this Logitech is none of those things. Comfortable with an excellent range, I recommend this to anyone looking for a great wireless headset. I've heard about some issues with the microphone however, so beware of that if you plan on long sessions of multiplayer gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B

customer_reviews.title: Defective device
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Pairs with station but no sound when using with xbox, playstation or aux input.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is very poor, they actually broke two months after I received ...
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is very poor , they actually broke two months after I received them , there were no mis use nor any instructions not followed in assembling all the wires together , i simply stopped hearing anything through the headset after two months of moderately using them ..
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless Headset F540
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming headset I have used. I had a Turtle Beach headset and the Logitech headset is way better in every way. I do not miss having to replace batteries since the Logitech headset has a rechargeable base so there is no need for batteries. When I am using the headset I do not hear any outside noise whatsoever. I would highly recommend this headset to anyone who wants a quality gaming experience without having to spend upwards on $150.00. It was a great deal getting them for $103.98 with free shipping. I received them from the Amazon seller in 2 days...it was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: dolphinfan

customer_reviews.title: ... ton of Logitech products and generally it's nothing but good recommendations, but this product just wanted to work ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy a ton of Logitech products and generally it's nothing but good recommendations, but this product just wanted to work so bad but didn't that it killed me. The microphone casing literally snapped from common use, I used electrical tape to fix it, the sound quality was better than without the tape...Then the headset simply stopped charging all together eventually just putting out a red "I'm done light." It worked plugged in for a few months after that, and then it just stopped completely. For the price, the quality was no where near what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Seal

customer_reviews.title: Was a good headset for about a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: Was a good headset for about a year and a half, but then the mic randomly started cutting out and it would annoy anyone I was trying to talk to. The audio still works fine and sounds great and the mic worked great for the first year and half.
customer_reviews.author: Keeku

customer_reviews.title: Awsome headset
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over the place for the perfect headset that i could use with my tv and xbox but i think i just found it. if you want a good headset one that is well constructed, comfortable, and good quality this is the one. It buzzes right when it starts but stops after like 5 seconds. The ear cuffs are actually made of nova foam so they are a nice fit. Also the earpiece didn't crack like my turtlebeach and triaxx 180 Edit: I just saw how nicely constructed this headset is, it is very strong and it has very nice and easy control. The wireless compatibility is very precise
customer_reviews.author: Herman123

customer_reviews.title: Trying to use the tv at night without disturbing anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I use these to watch tv, play video games, etc. at night so it doesn't disturb the house. They are very comfortable to wear! I haven't used the microphone for anything, so I can't comment on that. They were also easy to set up and work without any issues. I have a PS3, XBOX 360, DirecTV DVR, Wii, and Mac Mini hooked up to my TV as well as a surround sound system (connected via optical out). The unit is hooked up to the TV directly as well (via the red/white audio-out jack) and it works flawlessly with all the devices. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: absolutstyle03

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it. It keeps the house quite so that the rest of us can sleep while he is playing video games. The only problem with it is that the microphone doesn't come through the speakers. So he is talking really loud but doesn't realize it. After a while he got used to it and now he doesn't talk loud. Overall a great headset.
customer_reviews.author: ekparker

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was flawless. No scuffs or any damage to the product. After opening all of the wires (PS3, Xbox 360, RC, 2.5 mm, power adapter) and the adapter itself, it was very easy to understand and use. Very comfortable fit on my head and it seems very flexible. The wires are a little annoying at first but after hooking it up and rearranging my table a little bit, I was able to disguise the wires and turn on the headset just fine. Crisp, clear sound and great quality. I would recommend this product to anybody wanting a nice wireless headset for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Will always be in my heart!
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite headset over all the wireless till I upgraded to the Steel series H Wireless I had my PC going with games as well. I had to buy a 6 Foot 3.5mm to Stereo RCA Male Cable for all connection but that was it. Can connect 3 things together. I did. PC,PS3, TV. Set up Worked great till 6months- A year from daily overuse.
customer_reviews.author: Kanaan P.

customer_reviews.title: Supurb Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have terrific sound. I love they fact I can have my 360, PS3, and PC all hooked up to them at once, without switching any wires around. The stereo sound is great, and you can hear footsteps a mile away on most FPS. My only complaint is they are a tad heavy, and can cause "Hot-Ear" after about an hour or so, so a break is needed every now and again.. I also watch blu-rays through these, and they sound even better than the optical speakers I have.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Logitec F540
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great. The audio brings the game to life and it remains comfortable for hours. I would have given a 5 star rating if I could move the mike boom closer to the mouth, although no one I talk to has complained about not hearing me. Just a personal preference since I have worn headsets for years while flying. Both my son and I are avid gamers he(XBOX) and I (PS3) use the headset for hours. In fact I bought another one for him, although it is hard waiting for Christmas, especially when we play at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: silverback

customer_reviews.title: The sound is fine and the headphones perform as advertised through the manufacturer ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine and the headphones perform as advertised through the manufacturer but they were clearly not new. The microphone had dust built up in it. The cords had obviously been used and in some cases on the verge of needing to be replaced. After cleaning everything and replacing the charging cord and USB input cord I was comfortable with using the headphones. Kind of a disappointing buy. This is an item that I would definitely purchase new. Thanks Obama.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless product I have tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for over a year now, using it with my PS3, and the only issues that I have had with it (game sound and mic sound disappearing) were due to the PS3 settings somehow being reset. Battery life seems to be pretty decent. I've never had any issues with it unless I've just not charged it all in a month's time. However, I don't really play more than 10 hours a week though. I have been impressed with this product so much that I gave them as gifts to other members of my family and they have been just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. A friend liked them so much, I gave him my first ones and purchased another. Of course the one I gave away was perfect. My new ones have a slight hissing noise when the boom is up. Not too bad, but is noticeable. Other than that, they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Saber

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: To start off, I never write reviews, but WOW! I have to take a moment of my time to give these people the rating they deserve. These headphones are amazing!!! Currently I am listening to my pandora account with wireless headphones. Playing Call of Duty just got a thousand times more enjoyable! only thing that I was dissapointed about was that I needed the AV cables from my PS3 in order to hear anything from the game. Sound quality couldn't be better, just a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works on PC
customer_reviews.text: It is not mentioned anywhere on the packaging or the docs, but the USB port on the PS3 connection area is HID compatible. This means you can use the headset on a PC or Mac. I use Linux myself and it works perfectly. Finally a device that works on either an Xbox or a PC. Since I keep both on my desk, I find this saves a ton of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Newman

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just awesome sound quality. Having had Bose noise cancelling headphones before, I hold these to be just as good or better. And they are wireless. Perhaps I miss a stand where they charge easily. Having to connect them with a cable is probably the only con.
customer_reviews.author: PeOR

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: In using this product for almost 7 months I come to see no problems with the Logitech Wireless Headset. It has became a great use to me in my gaming. The sound of the headset is good. The feel of the padding feel quite comfortable in your own adjustment. They are very light weight and easy to forget they are even on your head. But I found that after wearing the heatset after 3 or more hours they seem to leave a pain to the top of my head. But in my opinion all headsets do that. I would recommend the headset to anybody who is looking for a great headset for a great price..
customer_reviews.author: jeff clark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headset with very convenient buttons for adjusting volumes
customer_reviews.text: As of 12/9/2014 no longer functioning properly. Seems to be approaching the end of its life. Comfortable headset with very convenient buttons for adjusting volumes. Easy to mute/unmute. Battery life could be better, I think a charge gets me a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua James Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Randomly stopped working and won't power up.
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I bought this product in 2011, but I barely used the unit. Worked well at first.Then randomly stopped working. Seems as though either the cheesy power supply crapped out, or something in the base unit because no lights come on and it is not powering up. Not very good for $100.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lang

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have recomended these to both my uncle and little brother, and we all love them! Great surround sound, the mic automatically turns on when you drop it down, long lasting rechargable battery. Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: dan lambert

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are nice. I wanted to get the Astros, but they were too much money. I sacrificed the surround sound and digital for anolog, but the sound is good, and I saved money. I need to see if they last 10 hours a charge though. I had sony headsets that used to die right away, and they would be too fuzzy and pop a lot, these headsets dont have a fuzz at all maybe a light one when there is nothing coming out of them during gameplay or such, but compared to a drop of a pin is the noise of the static. Good job Logitech. :) The rebate was nice too $25 :-) thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Redman

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, works as advertised. Don't know about the microphone, though I was disappointed to find out it has to be plugged into a wire--where does it say in the amazon ad that the mic isn't wireless?? Otherwise, it's a fine unit, and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: after reviewing lots af headphones, decided to take the plunge with this one, headeset volume and mic control works great, a bit concerned over the mini usb power connector on how that will hold up over time but other than tha very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: ian knox

customer_reviews.title: console headset, limited pc dunctionality
customer_reviews.text: meant for consoles, works for pc but settings are unadjustable in windows. great headset for conoles, no doubt about it, but dont bother if you plan on using it for pc normally
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah A.

customer_reviews.title: Optional Cable not needed if you use HDMI + Xbox 360 Setup
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, the Optional Cable is not needed if you use HDMI + Xbox 360 Setup. Just take the plastic covering off the end of the Xbox Audio Cable that came with your Xbox 360. Headphones are great btw, but are kinda heavy, need more padding on the head arch.
customer_reviews.author: Hater of the Year

customer_reviews.title: Had for a good while
customer_reviews.text: no complaints... i lost the adapter so i can plug it into "american" outlets so i had to get one from radio shack... i had no idea other countries used different plugs lol
customer_reviews.author: Angel G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Head Phones I have EVER Owned !
customer_reviews.text: Best Head Phones I have EVER Owned ! I LOVE THESE !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decemt headset
customer_reviews.text: If you're to close to the microwave audio starts popping.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these via my PS3 and my Onkyo receiver. They sound awesome and the mic is clear. My wife has no idea I'm gettin my butt kicked in BFBC2 in the wee hours of the morning now.
customer_reviews.author: TimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless Headset F540 with Stereo Game Audio
customer_reviews.text: 2.4 GHz wireless connectivity is very nice, very nice sound from anywhere in the house. Had the Turtle beach X41 and those got static if i wasn't close to the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Bluetooth

customer_reviews.title: Dollar to dollar it's the best headset out there
customer_reviews.text: If you consider the price, this is the best gaming headset out there. The sound is crisp and clear and it's a comfortable fit. Getting it setup is relatively easy and it's universal. I have it setup so that I can use it for gaming or for watching tv or a movie. If youre willing to spend a bunch more money you might find something with better surround sound but for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddog01

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I no longer use my speakers on my computer, this is my main source of sound for games and internet viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven LaLoggia

customer_reviews.title: good headset
customer_reviews.text: quick video, nothing much to say other than it was worth the cost. a well made headset. logitech is always a great choice when choosing, wish politics with that easy
customer_reviews.author: John Gischala

customer_reviews.title: Favourite headset Ive owned
customer_reviews.text: I have a trident, cyborg, razor and this headset and the logitech F540 is still my favourite. It doesnt overload the speakers with base as other headphones are inclided to do, can be recharged while playing, doesnt need batteries and the base can work for a variety of devices including xbox, ps3 and PC.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gazley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Logitech. Also works with the PS2. I found the sound quality to be great...also having the volume controls right on the headphones is very helpful. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Promiscuous Popsicle

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Logitech's G930, this thing is quite cumbersome. Good quality but was not what I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Navam H.

customer_reviews.title: great value for a wireless headset for xbox360
customer_reviews.text: great product and i agreed with all the reviews. it is quality built and wireless is a great plus. For xbox 360: - you will still need to run a wire from the headphone to the controller. - if you are running full HDMI, you will need to purchase an additional RCA audio cable adapter (Gen RCA Audio Cable Adapter for XBOX 360 + Slim) and it will fit nicely with your HDMI. - bass and volume control are not as powerful as TB's wired ear force dx 21 with 5.1 DSS.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wen

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the PS3!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a headset that would work with the PS3. After trying several, I tried these, and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Oh god why
customer_reviews.text: Sporadically it decides its going to do its best imitation of a dying cat some one somehow magically stuffed in the headset. It mainly decides to do this if there is any interruption such as pausing the program or muting it. Otherwise it would of been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Awful sidetone
customer_reviews.text: Sidetone is the echoing of what your microphone picks up back to your headphones. It supposedly helps people realize how loud they are speaking. The problem with the F540 is that the sidetone is so loud that you can hear every single thing happening around you: your breathing, you scratching yourself, you moving in your chair, opening drawers... and you can't disable sidetone, so you constantly hear white noise and all the sounds around you. Too bad because the headset itself is comfortable. The sidetone just makes this product unusable.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert.r

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life gets lower and lower every time you recharge it. Sound isn't digital, it's analog.
customer_reviews.author: amw157

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted....14 months!!
customer_reviews.text: The battery stopped recharging after 13 months. We now have to keep it plugged in to use. Defeats the purpose of spending EXTRA to buy the wireless headset. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: i read several reviews on this and i was skeptial about buying them. Well i dont think i will ever buy another pair again. they fit beyond confortable and the mic is great. only odd detial was the mic was on the left side. other than that I would give it 10 Stars....if there was such a rating
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for my teenage, gamer son. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my teenage, gamer son. It was just what he was looking for and didn't break the bank. So far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carbone

customer_reviews.title: It is worth buying
customer_reviews.text: So I just got my headset today it was easy to setup and amazing quality I just got done playing bl2 and the sound was awesome its just the mic feels to me they could of done a lot better for this price would not pass this up
customer_reviews.author: Adrienna

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: actually the main reason for getting this headphone is for Audio Books since i can listen while im doing anything with worrying about the wires but the sound is not that good, its really low, didnt try it with ps3 or xbox
customer_reviews.author: Khalid Al H

customer_reviews.title: Logitech wireless headset f540
customer_reviews.text: One of the cords didn't work, tried different things, after a few days we tried the charging cord from controller and now they work fine. Tried contacting Logitech, but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Y.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is great took me awhile to figure out but once I learned what I was doing. It was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: aaronhart2010

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work great for the xbox360. The have great battery life. Also the only problem is my sons fighting over them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Golubich

customer_reviews.title: Good headset.
customer_reviews.text: Good headset. They have a lot of options for hooking up to various equipment but that is also the negative. There are tooooo many wires and cables for a wireless headset.
customer_reviews.author: Very picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to people who would like to upgrade form the xbox live headset because it is not too expensive and it's a massive improvement over the stock headset.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Byron

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to set up. The only problem is the mic is awkward Giid price very good headset
customer_reviews.author: Dustin71

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These headphones r awesome so worth the money they r very comfortable ,loud , easy to set up ( jus make sure u have ur original cables for w.e gaming system u have ) very good quality headpho nes u can feel it when u pick them up . Dont waste ur money on turtle beach rocketfish triton or w.e garbage is out there i would highly reccomend these headphones to any serious gamers .so worth the money ...they r also very light weight ..u can also wear them for a long period of time with out feeling uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ant32165

customer_reviews.title: really good performance
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, long battery duration, great comfort and utility, nice range, and an amazing experience of sound, such a good quality, no matter they are not 7.1 it feels like it
customer_reviews.author: Juan E. Cardona U

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I'm from AUS and bought this. It had the US power plug so i just bought a converter from Dick Smiths and it works like a charm. Best headset I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Power Supply! Can't even use them.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived at my address in the United States from seller "Dependable Resource" with a foreign power supply despite the fact that the manual clearly shows an American power supply (page 5). Radio Shack didn't even have a power adapter that would work with these. Furthermore, isn't compatible with HDMI. Can't say how the sound quality is without HDMI, because I can't even use them! Tried to contact seller for appropriate power supply, but unable to reach them (their website sucks). I guess you have to pay a fortune to get wireless headphones that actually work. Too bad... DO NOT RECOMMEND THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bryant

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: THIS HEAD SET SPEAKS FOR ITSELF DIFFENTLY ONE OF THE BEST OUT FOR THE PRICE YA CAN'T BEAT IT ALSO THE QUALITY OF THIS HEADSET IS UNBELIEVABLE, I HAVE TO SAY THIS IS ONE COOL HEADSET I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM C FUNN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at best
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with an American plug.--Only an Australian one.-Had to hunt down an expensive adapter, then it Doesn't work with an HDMI cable. Doesn't have a digital audio cable input: only RCA connectors. Doesn't work with XBox chat. I'm returning it and I recommend that you do not buy it. These headphones should have had a warning label. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: renunciate

customer_reviews.title: Non United States Plug on this Seller's Product
customer_reviews.text: This item came with a foreign (non U.S.) power plug and a poor quality plug adaptor for the U.S. You have been warned. The headset is great but this is a non United States product by this seller. I will be buying a replacement DC converter power cord as a result.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Quality, and More!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Logitech G930 for over 2 years now, (F540 is the sister of the G930) and when I found this I just had to buy it. Seeing that it was the G930, just revamped for console, I knew it would be very comfortable. The F540 is one of the most comfortable gaming headsets I have found. I did not like many of the Turtle Beach's fit. The sound quality also is superb; surround sound makes it easy to hear where other players are when playing Call of Duty or other first person shooters. Setting it up is also easy, just a few cables and you're done! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who plays video games.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Johnston

customer_reviews.title: These broke on my within two months
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty bulky and hardly seem ideal for gaming. If you need a headset for the PC, don't get these because you have to buy extra cords. If they didn't break down on me, they'd probably get a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hat

customer_reviews.title: Logitech F540
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive, but really efficient! A very nice product, sound is clear, adjustable, only the price is too high!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Worried
customer_reviews.text: The base adapter did not worked!!! It switch off after couple of seconds... However, lucky Nokia phone charger's output is almost same as the adapter. So I start using it. Other than that Headphone is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rajith Waruna Nuwan Perera

product_meta.title: Logitech Wireless Headset F540 with Stereo Game Audio
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Don't wake the house. with the logitech wireless headset f540 you can play your ps3 and xbox 360 games with stereo game audio and voice chat through one headset.
feature_bullets: Get detailed stereo game audio plus clear voice chat for your PS3 and Xbox 360 from a single headset
2.4 GHz wireless connectivity means no living-room tangles and performance without compromises

Rechargeable batteries let you play up to 10 hours* from a single charge or charge while you play.* Actual battery life varies with use, settings and environmental conditions. Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles.
Multiple audio inputs let you plug in TV, MP3 player by using additional RCA and 3.5 mm ports on the wireless base station
Over-the-ear design gives great audio performance while adjustable headband and cushioned ear cups provide comfortable fit for wide variety of head sizes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars208 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
